verbose_text: A recent work showed that T3SS also activates the cytosolic nucleotide binding domain, leucine rich repeat containing caspase activation and recruitment domain CARD _ containing 4 (NLRC4) inflammasome, which activates caspase-1 and induces gasdermin mediated cytotoxicity and the release of mature IL-1beta.
evidence: NLRC4) inflammasome, which activates caspase-1 and induces gasdermin-mediated cytotoxicity and the release of mature IL-1beta
